item.title: US Equities Rally Is Running on Liquidity and AI's Tech-Revolution
item.description: US Equities Rally Is Running on Liquidity and AI’s Tech-Revolution The US stock market has been on a rally in recent months, with the S&P 500 index up more than 10% year-to-date. There are a number of factors driving the rally, including:

item.title: AI Alarmists Are Dragging Us All Down a Rabbit Hole
item.description: AI Alarmists Are Dragging Us All Down a Rabbit Hole Introduction Artificial intelligence (AI) is a powerful technology that has the potential to do great good or great harm. Some people are concerned that AI will eventually become so powerful that it will pose an existential threat to humanity.

item.title: AI Longtermism Alarmists Are Dragging Us Down Existential Rabbit Hole
item.description: AI Longtermism Alarmists Are Dragging Us Down Existential Rabbit Hole Introduction Artificial intelligence (AI) is a powerful technology that has the potential to do great good or great harm. Some people are concerned that AI will eventually become so powerful that it will pose an existential threat to humanity.

item.title: Software Company New Relic in Talks to Be Sold
item.description: According to a report by the Wall Street Journal, private-equity firms Francisco Partners and TPG are jointly bidding over $5 billion to acquire New Relic, a software company specializing in analytics and observability tools [^1^][^2^][^3^]. The article did not provide any further information about the potential acquisition.

item.title: In Ukraine, Technology Only Thickens the Fog of War
item.description: The conflict in Ukraine has been ongoing for years, with no clear end in sight. As technology advances, it has become increasingly intertwined with the conflict, with both sides utilizing it to gain an advantage. On May 17, 2023, Bloomberg published an article titled “In Ukraine, Technology Only Thickens the Fog of War” by Leonid Bershidsky.
